title: # 415 - Jen Kirkman & ME
description:
Today I chat remotely with Jen Kirkman. We talk about Karens, graduation speeches, aging, anxiety, everyday sexism, marriage/divorce, and much more! 

Check out Jen’s Podcast “Having Funlessness with Jen Kirkman” Wherever you get yours! 

This podcast is brought to you by Tiege Hanley. Get started for just $25 when you visit http://www.tiege.com/bertcast and get a FREE toiletry/dopp bag with your first box. 

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, and sexual wellness for men. Try hims today and get your first month free. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. Check out this week’s menu and get thirty dollars off across your first two deliveries when you visit http://www.Blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Crossrope. Get up to $40 off Crossrope sets plus free shipping when you checkout today at

http://www.crossrope.com/bertcast     

This episode is also brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Go to http://www.OmahaSteaks.com and type BERT in the search bar and save 55% when you send the Summer Sizzle Pack for $79.99 and get FREE STEAK-CUT BACON with your order! 

This episode is also brought to you by Aspiration. Save Money. Save the Planet. To open your Aspiration Spend and Save cash management account, text BERT to 64-000 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
